oauth_demo

Class DropboxStatus

  • java.lang.Object
    • oauth_demo.DropboxStatus

  • public class DropboxStatus
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains status information used after completion of a workflow task.

    It includes an HTTP status, message and an optional redirect URL.

    Construct an object as follows:

    DropboxStatus dropboxStatus = new DropboxStatus(200, pageBody);

    DropboxStatus dropboxStatus = new DropboxStatus(301, DropboxStatus.makeUrl(redirectUrl));

    DropboxStatus dropboxStatus = new DropboxStatus(400, &quot;Forbidden&quot;);;

    • Field Detail

      • httpStatus

        public int httpStatus
        HTTP status following an authorisation action.

        Valid values include:

        • 200 - success
        • 301 - URL redirect required
        • 4xx, 5xx - an error has occurred
        See Also:
        Dropbox Standard API errors

      • message

        public java.lang.String message
        HTTP status message.

        For httpStatus = 200, this is the entire HTML page being served

      • timeNow

        public java.lang.String timeNow
        Time at which action was performed (eg authorisation completed).

      • redirectUrl

        public java.net.URL redirectUrl
        If redirection is required, the URL to redirect to.

        Redirection is indicated by an httpStatus of 301. It occurs in the second step of the redirect workflow. If httpStatus is not 301, this field is ignored.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DropboxStatus

        public DropboxStatus(int httpStatus)
        Constructor when an HTTP status is needed.
        Parameters:
        httpStatus - HTTP status

      • DropboxStatus

        public DropboxStatus(int httpStatus,
                     java.lang.String message)
        Constructor when an HTTP status and message are needed.
        Parameters:
        message - message to be displayed - if status is 200, then the entire HTML page, otherwise (for an error status) the error text (eg 'Forbidden' for 400)
        httpStatus - HTTP status

      • DropboxStatus

        public DropboxStatus(int httpStatus,
                     java.net.URL redirectUrl)
        Constructor when a redirect URL is needed.
        Parameters:
        httpStatus - HTTP status (will normally be 301)
        redirectUrl - URL to redirect to

      • DropboxStatus

        public DropboxStatus(int httpStatus,
                     java.lang.String message,
                     java.net.URL redirectUrl)
        Constructor when a message and redirect URL are needed.
        Parameters:
        httpStatus - HTTP status (will normally be 301)
        message - message to be displayed for redirect
        redirectUrl - URL to redirect to

        public static java.net.URL makeUrl(java.lang.String urlString)
        Construct a URL object from a string.

        This method is provided to simplify constructing objects of this class.

        Parameters:
        urlString - the string representation of a URL, eg http://www.example.com/home
        Returns:
        Java URL object representing the URL

        Parameters:

        Returns:
